name: Cambridge Medical Imaging
comment:
Diagnostic imaging clinic
  • x-ray services
  • ultrasound
  • bone mineral density testing
  • mammography (breast x-rays used to screen and diagnose medical conditions)
  • vascular ultrasound

Ontario Breast Screening Program - Breast screening for early detection of breast cancer in women * screening includes mammography (x-rays of breast tissue) * screening results are sent to both the woman and her doctor * women who receive normal results are automatically recalled for their next screening appointment * women who receive abnormal results are referred to their doctor for further investigation, or are referred directly for additional tests

Services and Programs:
  • Cambridge Medical Imaging - Ontario Breast Screening Program

Diagnostic imaging clinic<ul><li>x-ray services</li><li>ultrasound</li><li>bone mineral density testing</li><li>mammography (breast x-rays used to screen and diagnose medical conditions) <br></li><li>vascular ultrasound<br><br></li></ul><b>Ontario Breast Screening Program</b> - Breast screening for early detection of breast cancer in women * screening includes mammography (x-rays of breast tissue) * screening results are sent to both the woman and her doctor * women who receive normal results are automatically recalled for their next screening appointment * women who receive abnormal results are referred to their doctor for further investigation, or are referred directly for additional tests<BR><BR><B>Services and Programs:</B><UL><LI>Cambridge Medical Imaging - Ontario Breast Screening Program</LI></UL>
